div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 07:55 am CDT

div.div: A 20 percent chance of showers after 4pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 67. Windy, with a north northwest wind 21 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 39 mph.

A 20 percent chance of showers before 8pm. Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming clear, with a low around 42. Breezy, with a north northwest wind 15 to 20 mph decreasing to 6 to 11 mph after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 32 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 74. Northwest wind 5 to 7 mph becoming calm in the morning.

font.marquee: All Mead Public Schools Facilities will be closed indefinitely (3/24/20).

div.p: At their January 23rd meeting, the NSAA Board of Directors took action to require written authorization and consent prior to placing a student’s name on the NSAA May 1st Transfer List. This new requirement is effective immediately. . . .
